amendment.description: To authorize, with an offset, an additional $1,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Army for Warhead/Grenade Scientific Based Manufacturing Technology.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2484 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2484 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12591) To authorize, with an offset, an additional $1,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Army for Warhead/Grenade Scientific Based Manufacturing Technology.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2484 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2484 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum.
